text: Apani tadera madhye yake icche apanara kacha theke dure rakhate parena ebam yake icche apanara kache sthana dite parena [1]. Ara apani yake dure rekhechena take kamana karale apanara kono aparadha ne'i [2]. E bidhana e jan'ye ye, eta tadera cokha juranora adhika nikatabarti ebam tara duhkha pabe na ara taderake apani ya debena tate tadera pratyeke'i khusi thakabe [3]. Ara tomadera antare ya ache allaha ta janena ebam allaha sarbajna, sahanasila
